title: Find Dribbles the Clown
content:
Find Dribbles the Clown Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Circus of The Last Days Reward Spellmight Gloves

Find Dribbles the Clown

Find Dribbles the Clown is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Find Dribbles the Clown can be acquired during Act 3. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Find Dribbles the Clown Objectives

Find all body parts of Dribbles

Find Dribbles the Clown W
